item.description:
Please join us for an exciting mushroom hunting event that is a part of this years Essex County Trails and Sails celebration!

From the website:

Join ENHC Commissioner and nature-lover Tim Clark for a hunt for native mushrooms through the lush woods of South Hamilton followed by tea and refreshments at his farm. This is a one-of-a-kind event that celebrates our intimate woods and rare wild edibles that can be found in our own backyards.

http://www.essexherit...

The loose agenda:
1:45- Meet and greet at the property
2:00- Join the mushroom hunting party and head out to the woods
Since this has been organized by Trails and Sails we'll wrap up with the rest of the group.

Please bring appropriate footwear for a hike through the woods
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be wearing a lavender hat
item.name: Essex County Mushroom Hunt
